events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team is excited to review your qualifications and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster, specifically for the software developer role within our devops team.
A recruiter from our Engineering division has been assigned to your case and will be your primary contact throughout the interview process.
Your application passed the initial screening stage. We are impressed with your background in software engineering and will proceed to schedule a technical interview.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview. We appreciate your timely response and enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare to discuss your devops and software development experience.
You have successfully completed the technical interview. The interviewers noted your strong skills and problem-solving abilities in software and devops.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the software engineer position. Please review the terms and respond at your earliest convenience.
Thank you for accepting our offer. We look forward to welcoming you to the team and supporting your journey with us.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive all necessary information regarding your role, tools, and team introductions shortly.
Your hiring process is now complete. Welcome officially aboard as part of our engineering division. We wish you great success in your role.
